name: Cloud Skippers
description:
a game made in 7 days for the brackeys game jam 2021.1 by akivab and merpederp.

theme: stronger together

controls: sun - a,d moon - left arrow, right arrow, jump - space

The sun and moon are in love! help them get to each other in every level. though sometimes love isn't always enough to find the way, sometimes love isn't always possible if u could never really reach each other.

 much funner to play with a friend. this game is hard so try not to get toxic and angry in the comments, be patient. have fun and enjoy!!!

please leave a comment if u enjoyed (or if u didn't)!
